schools.name: Salt Creek Academy
schools.school-summary: Salt Creek Academy, a public school located in Athens, IL, serves grades 10-11 in the Sangamon Regional Office Of Education.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Athens Sr High School
schools.school-summary: Athens Sr High School, a public school located in Athens, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Athens Community Unit School District 213.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Athens Junior High School
schools.school-summary: Athens Junior High School, a public school located in Athens, IL, serves grades 7-8 in the Athens Community Unit School District 213.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
